prescription.title: Add your prescription values
prescription.description: Or we will suggest the right lens for your vision need, so you can go hussle free

manual.title: Enter your prescription

card.title: Enter it manually
card.description: This is our quickest and most popular method. We will then recommend the most suitable lens type.

manual.subtitle: Add your prescription values and we'll recommend the best lens for your vision needs.

alerts.axisRangeError: The AXIS values you’ve inserted are not correct! These values must be between 1 and 180.
alerts.axisZeroError: The AXIS values you’ve inserted are not correct! If CYL value is higher or lower than 0, AXIS values can’t be 0.
alerts.sphPositiveNegativeWarning: You’ve inserted 1 positive and 1 negative value, which is very rare. We suggest double checking your prescription. If this is correct, you can proceed.
alerts.pdSmallerThanAverageWarning: The selected PD is smaller than average, we suggest double checking your prescription. If you don’t have the PD here how to measure it
alerts.incompatibleWithPrescriptionTitle: Sorry! The frame you’ve chosen isn’t compatible with your prescription
alerts.incompatibleWithPrescriptionBody: but don’t worry, compatible frames are available
alerts.agreementText: By clicking this box, I confirm that the prescription values entered above are taken from a valid (not expired) prescription issued to me, signed by a licensed optometrist or ophthalmologist.

continueModal.title: Send prescription later
continueModal.message: By clicking on continue, you will be skipping the prescription step. We’ll ask for it after your order, either by uploading it or having us call your doctor.

card.title: Get it from my account
card.description: Log in and select your prescription.

upload.title: Your prescription
upload.subtitle: Before submitting your prescription, please check the expiration date to make sure it's still valid.

card.title: Upload it now
card.description: And we'll take care of the rest. We accept the following file formats: .pdf, .png, .jpeg, .gif, .tiff, .bmp, .docx (max10MB) and IWork pages

doctor.title: Add your doctor details
doctor.subtitle: We'll get your prescription details directly from him/her

card.title: Call my doctor
card.description: We'll get your prescription directly from him/her.

card.title: Send it later
card.description: We'll ask for it after you order, either by uploading it or having us call your doctor.

treatmentsFamily.title: Choose your lens type
treatmentsFamily.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class Ray-Ban technology. Scratch resistant and UV protection are included.

blueLight.title: Blue-light filtering
blueLight.description: Reduces exposure to blue light from digital screens, which can help prevent eye-fatigue.

transition.title: Transition ® Signature ® GEN 8™
transition.description: One pair for indoors and outdoors with Transitions® lenses: quickly darken and fade to clear, so you never have to change glasses.

clear.title: Clear
clear.description: Traditional, transparent lenses perfect for everyday use

sun.title: Sun
sun.description: Choose from different lens colors and tints.

gvpTreatment.title: Choose your Great Value Package
gvpTreatment.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class LensCrafters technology.

thickness.title: Choose your lens thickness
thickness.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class Ray-Ban technology. Scratch resistant and UV protection are included.

treatments.title: Choose your light responsive treatment
treatments.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class Ray-Ban technology. Scratch-resistant treatment  and UV protection are included.

color.title: Choose your lens color
color.subtitle: Enhanced color and contrast so you can see more detail

tooltip.switch: Reduces glare in extra bright light, for superior clarity and protection of the eye.
tooltip.polarized: Reduces glare in extra bright light, for superior clarity and protection of the eye.

addOns.label: Already included in your lens
addOns.title: Complete your lenses
addOns.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class Ray-Ban technology. Scratch-resistant and UV protection are included.

review.title: Review your selections
review.subtitle: Your glasses will come with best in class Ray-Ban technology.
review.discountTitle: 40% off prescription lenses is automatically applied

paymentInstallments.installmentsLabel: Pay over time in interest-free installments with ###INSTALLMENTS###

modal.title: Paying in installments
modal.subtitle:
Want to spread out the cost of your order with ###BRAND###? 
 Select ###INSTALLMENTS### as your payment method at checkout 
 to pay in interest-free installments, with no hidden fees.
modal.affirm: With Affirm, make 3 interest-free payments every two weeks with zero hidden fees. Payment options are offered by Affirm, are subject to an eligibility check, and may not be available in all states. CA residents: Loans by Affirm Loan Services, LLC are made or arranged pursuant to a California Finance Lender license.
modal.afterpay: With Afterpay, make 4 interest-free payments, every two weeks. You must be over 18, a resident of the U.S., and meet additional eligibility criteria to qualify. Late fees may apply. Click here for complete terms. Loans to California residents made or arranged are pursuant to a California Finance Lenders Law license.

review.tooltip: Ensure your eyewear with an extended warranty for unlimited repair and replacement at any LensCrafters store.

prescription.toggleLabel: Add your prescription values, we’ll help you find the perfect lens for your vision needs.
prescription.prescriptionTitle: Add your prescription values, we’ll show you the perfect lens for your vision needs.
prescription.addLabel: I also have an ADD value
prescription.doctorDetails: We'll ask for a copy of your prescription or doctor's details during or after checkout
prescription.positiveNegativeError: You've entered one positive value and one negative value, which is quite rare. We suggest double checking your prescription.
prescription.compatibleFrameError: Sorry! The frame you've chosen isn't compatible with your prescription.
prescription.compatibleFrameSubLabel: But don't worry, compatible frames are available.
prescription.axisError: Remember to add your AXIS values
prescription.axisSubError: These values must be between 0 and 180.
prescription.axisSubErrorZero: If CYL value is higher or lower than 0, AXIS values can’t be 0.
prescription.missingInputMessage: Add your missing values to complete the upload of your prescription and we'll recommend the most suitable lens.
prescription.defaultInputMessage: Choose to add your prescription now or upload it later.
prescription.readyMessage: We are now able to suggest the right lens for you!
prescription.proceedCheckbox: By clicking this box, I confirm that the prescription values entered above are taken from a unexpired written prescription issued to me, signed by a licensed optometrist or ophthalmologist.

exitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit?
exitSubtitle: Your lens selection will not be saved
